title: Why did the Carryminati Yalgaar rap song get viral in less than a hour? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because people were already known about it. because Carry Minati had released a Trailer of it already. So people were eagerly waiting for this song they were thinking what will be in this video what carry minati do in this video, what Carry Minati Will say about TikTokers In this video or What he will say to Youtube for deleting his most famous vidoe from youtube. There are thing that people were waiting to see in this video that is why it went viral in less hour.
